import React, { useState } from "react"; import data from "../../mock-data.json"; import "./Todos.css" const Todos = () => { const [contacts, setContacts] = useState(data); const [addFormData, setAddFormData] = useState({ fullName: "", address: "", }) return ( <>
{ data.map(item => ( )) }
N. Name Address Phone Number Email
1 {item.fullName} {item.address} {item.phoneNumber} {item.email}
); }; export default Todos;
